README:

It is distrubuted under the terms of the GNU General Public Licence
Version 3 (see the LICENCE file).

If you find this useful, please cite the following paper:

Brewer, B. J. 2008. Getting Your Eye In: A Bayesian Analysis of Early Dismissals in Cricket. ArXiv e-print, arXiv:0801.4408.

Note that the model implemented in this code is not the same as the model in that paper, but it is similar in spirit.

Dependencies (and the version I used for development)

Python		2.7.2
Numpy		1.6.1
Matplotlib	1.1.0
BeautifulSoup4 and Html5lib (optional - for fetching data from web)
